mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer, trainer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{trainer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where writer = #{writer} and bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
